P

plane - Variable in class geometries.Polygon
Associated plane in which the polygon lies.
Plane - Class in geometries
Represents a plane in 3D space, defined by either three points or a point and a normal vector.
Plane(Point, Point, Point) - Constructor for class geometries.Plane
Constructs a plane defined by three points.
Plane(Point, Vector) - Constructor for class geometries.Plane
Constructs a plane defined by a point and a normal vector.
Point - Class in primitives
Represents a point in 3D space.
Point(Double, Double, Double) - Constructor for class primitives.Point
Constructs a point with the specified x, y, and z coordinates.
Point(Double3) - Constructor for class primitives.Point
Constructs a point from a Double3 object.
Polygon - Class in geometries
Polygon class represents a two-dimensional polygon in 3D Cartesian coordinate system.
Polygon(Point...) - Constructor for class geometries.Polygon
Polygon constructor based on vertices list.
primitives - package primitives
 
printGrid(int, Color) - Method in class renderer.Camera

product(Double3) - Method in record class primitives.Double3
Product two floating point triads into a new triad where each couple of numbers is multiplied
